instruction: Generate a short bio for a professional chef.
output: John Smith is a professional chef who has been cooking for over 20 years. He started off as a sous chef in a small restaurant but quickly rose to become the head chef in several establishments. John excels at creating gourmet dishes, with a heavy emphasis on fresh ingredients that create a masterpiece on the plate. He is also passionate about teaching and has spent time mentoring young chefs, as well as teaching classes on cuisine and cooking.
